variables.variable: \, and you smoothly step away from the blow|\, and you make ready with .+?|\, and you raise .+?|\, but his thrust hits your powerful aura and rebounds back into himself|\, but her thrust hits your powerful aura and rebounds back into herself|\. His weapon \w+ through the air\, missing you completely|\. Her weapon cuts through the air\, missing you completely|\. [A-Z][a-z]+\'s .+? \w+ your .+?\, which completely absorbs the blow|\. [A-Z][a-z]+\'s .+? \w+ your .+?\, and you easily deflect the blow|\. With a flick of your \w+\, you easily deflect [A-Z][a-z]+\s \w+|\.[A-Z][a-z]+\'s .+? strikes your .+? and bounces harmlessly off

trigger.match: \, but your \w+ hits [hH](?:is|er) powerful aura and rebounds back into you\.
trigger.name: wound_rebound

trigger.match: ^With a deft move\, [A-Z][a-z]+ retaliates with a quick swing of (.+?) at you(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_riposte

trigger.match: \bwho brandishes (.+?)\.
trigger.name: wound_coule
trigger.send: flags:add_check ("coule", "%1") EnableTrigger("wound_coule2", true) prompt:queue (function () EnableTrigger("wound_coule2", false) flags:del_check ("coule") end, "wounds_coule")

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+\'s blade runs down the shaft of your weapon(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_coule2

trigger.match: ^Your wound status is\:$
trigger.name: wound_status
trigger.send: EnableTriggerGroup ("System_WoundStatus", true) EnableTrigger ("wound_status", false) prompt:queue (function () EnableTriggerGroup ("System_WoundStatus", false) wounds:scan () end, "wound_status")

trigger.match: ^Right Arm\s+(\d+)\s+\w+$
trigger.name: wound_status16

trigger.match: ^Left Arm\s+(\d+)\s+\w+$
trigger.name: wound_status17

trigger.match: ^Right Leg\s+(\d+)\s+\w+$
trigger.name: wound_status18

trigger.match: ^Left Leg\s+(\d+)\s+\w+$
trigger.name: wound_status19

trigger.match: ^Cleaving through your defenses\, [A-Z][a-z]+ makes a slow deadly strike at your (?:.+?) with (.+?)(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack1

trigger.match: ^With a focused look\, [A-Z][a-z]+ strikes at you with (.+?)(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack2

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ (?:wildly )?swings (.+?) at you(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack3

trigger.match: ^Sweeping (.+?) through the air overhead\, [A-Z][a-z]+ sends it whooshing straight towards your .+?(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack4

trigger.match: ^With a heavy overhand stroke\, [A-Z][a-z]+ slams (.+?) down upon you(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack5

trigger.match: ^Letting (.+?) droop\, [A-Z][a-z]+ suddenly heaves it up at you(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack6

trigger.match: ^Flourishing (.+?) above (?:[hH]is|[hH]er) head\, [A-Z][a-z]+ takes a swing at you(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack7

trigger.match: ^Swinging (.+?) in an underhand arc\, [A-Z][a-z]+ strikes at you(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack8

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ wildly jabs (.+?) at you(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack9

trigger.match: ^With a powerful lunge\, [A-Z][a-z]+ strikes at you with (.+?)(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack10

trigger.match: ^Holding (.+?) poised at an angle overhead\, [A-Z][a-z]+ unleashes a violent assault at your .+?(?:(@!system_miss)|\, and you partially parry the blow with .+?)?\.
trigger.name: wound_attack11

trigger.match: (?:^With a powerful lunge\,| crushed )
trigger.name: wound_power1

trigger.match: (?: sends it whooshing straight towards your | unleashes a violent assault at your )
trigger.name: wound_power2

trigger.match: You are \w+ in the cheek for a small flesh wound\.$

trigger.name: wound_add4

trigger.match: The \w+ to your (left|right) leg leaves only a nick on your thigh\.$
trigger.name: wound_add5

trigger.match: You are \w+ in the forehead and blink away blood\.$

trigger.match: You receive a bloody gash from the \w+ to your chest\.$

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ through your chest\, gashing apart layers of skin to reveal your bloody ribcage\.$

trigger.match: You reel from the mighty \w+ to your head\, seeing stars and flashes of light\.$
trigger.name: wound_add12

trigger.match: Your belly opens up from the deep \w+\, spraying blood everywhere\.$

trigger.name: wound_add15

trigger.match: You are \w+ deep into your (left|right) leg\, gushing blood pooling at your feet\.$

trigger.match: You receive a nasty belly wound from the thrust of the blade\.$
trigger.name: wound_add24

trigger.match: You are stabbed in your (left|right) arm\, the blade painfully burrowing into your flesh\.$
trigger.name: wound_add25

trigger.match: The stab to your (left|right) thigh leaves a gaping hole\.$
trigger.name: wound_add26

trigger.match: The blade is driven into your throat\, which begins to spurt blood\.$
trigger.name: wound_add27

trigger.match: The blade slides between your ribs\, opening a hole that gushes blood\.$
trigger.name: wound_add28

trigger.match: You bleed like a stuck pig from the blade being plunged into your gut\.$
trigger.name: wound_add29

trigger.match: Your (left|right) arm is skewered by the blade\, driven completely through the other side\.$
trigger.name: wound_add30

trigger.match: The blade is driven cleanly through the meat of your (left|right) thigh\.$
trigger.name: wound_add31

trigger.match: You are dealt only a glancing blow to the side of your head from the \w+ swing\.$

trigger.match: You are \w+ in the chest and receive a small bruise\.$
trigger.name: wound_add33

trigger.match: You are barely fazed from getting \w+ in the gut\.$

trigger.match: Your (left|right) arm is \w+ and slightly bruised\.$
trigger.name: wound_add35

trigger.match: You receive only a red welt from your (left|right) leg being \w+\.$

trigger.match: You are \w+ in your head\, leaving an ugly bruise\.$
trigger.name: wound_add37

trigger.match: You stagger back from the force of being \w+ in the chest\.$

trigger.match: You grunt as you are \w+ in the gut\, forcing all the air out of your lungs\.$
trigger.name: wound_add39

trigger.name: wound_add40

trigger.match: You get a large bruise on your (left|right) thigh from being \w+ hard on the leg\.$
trigger.name: wound_add41

trigger.name: wound_add44

trigger.match: You falter in your tracks as your (left|right) arm receives a severe \w+\.$
trigger.name: wound_add45

trigger.match: You are thumped in the chest weakly\.$

trigger.match: You are tapped in the stomach with little effect\.$

trigger.match: You are tapped in the stomach with little effect\.$
trigger.name: wound_add49

trigger.name: wound_add51

trigger.match: You are painfully pounded in the face\.$
trigger.name: wound_add52

trigger.match: You are smacked in the chest with a solid blow\.$
trigger.name: wound_add53

trigger.match: You bare your teeth in pain as the .+? is thrust fiercely in your gut\.$
trigger.name: wound_add54

trigger.match: Your (left|right) arm is hit forcefully\, leaving an enormous bruise on the forearm\.$
trigger.name: wound_add55

trigger.match: Your (left|right) leg is smacked with a force that goes to the bone\.$
trigger.name: wound_add56

trigger.match: Your head whips back from the force of the blow\.$
trigger.name: wound_add57

trigger.match: You are brutally whacked in the chest and are forced to take several steps back\.$
trigger.name: wound_add58

trigger.match: Your eyes water and you can barely breathe as the blow punches hard into your belly\.$
trigger.name: wound_add59

trigger.match: Your (left|right) arm is almost dislocated from its shoulder as the .+? is driven deeply into your bicep\.$
trigger.name: wound_add60

trigger.match: You stumble and barely stay upright as the .+? is plowed deep into the meat of your (left|right) leg\.$
trigger.name: wound_add61

trigger.match: You are \w+ in the gut\, and the wind is knocked out of you\.$
trigger.name: wound_add62

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ your (left|right) (arm|leg)\, striking a major artery that splurts blood in all directions\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff1

trigger.match: Your (left|right) leg is completely \w+ through\, which immediately plops to the ground\, leaving only a bloody stump\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff2

trigger.match: You are \w+ in the (left|right) thigh\, cutting almost to the bone and causing your leg to buckle\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff3

trigger.match: Your (left|right) arm is completely \w+ through\, which flies through the air as blood splurts out in a fountain at the severed shoulder joint.$
trigger.name: wound_aff4

trigger.match: You are \w+ in the (left|right) elbow\, cutting deep into the bone and causing the arm to hang uselessly\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff5

trigger.match: You are \w+ in your (left|right) bicep and blood freely flows down your arm\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff6

trigger.match: Your (left|right) kneecap is \w+\, slicing through the bone and causing the leg to collapse\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff7
trigger.send: if affs:has("kneecap_%1leg") then if wounds ["cwpn"] then affs:prone("broken_%1leg") affs:prone () flags:add_check ("multiply", 1.1) end else wounds:aff ("%1leg", "kneecap_%1leg") end

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ your forehead\, causing blood to flow into your eyes and coat your entire face\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff8

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ deep into your (left|right) shoulder\, which severs a nerve and causes your entire \1 side to go numb\.
trigger.name: wound_aff9

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ your (left|right) (arm|leg)\, mangling a major artery that explodes blood in all directions\.
trigger.name: wound_aff10

trigger.match: You are \w+ in the (left|right) arm\, which becomes limp and falls to your side\.
trigger.name: wound_aff11

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ into the side of your head with a reverberating thunk of bone that rings in your ears\, causing you to stumble as everything becomes cloudy and the world spins\.
trigger.name: wound_aff12

trigger.match: Your (left|right) leg is elegantly \w+ and swept out from under you\, knocking you to the ground\.
trigger.name: wound_aff13

trigger.match: You are \w+ squarely in the nose\, which bleeds profusely\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff14

trigger.match: You are \w+ in the eye\, which turns purple and swells shut\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff15

trigger.match: You grimace in pain as your ribs are \w+ viciously\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff16

trigger.match: You cry out in pain as your jaw is \w+ and shatters\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff17

trigger.match: Your nose is savagely \w+ and breaks\, causing blood to splurt forth\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff18

trigger.match: Your (left|right) arm is \w+ and breaks with a loud crack\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff19

trigger.match: Your chest is brutally \w+ and your ribs snap under the force of the blow\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff20
trigger.send: if wounds ["weapons"] ["BC"] [wounds ["cwpn"]] then wounds:add ("chest", 4) elseif wounds ["weapons"] ["AL"] [wounds ["cwpn"]] then wounds:add ("chest", 6) end affs:add_queue ("crushedchest")

trigger.match: Your gut is \w+ with great force\, and blood begins to foam at your mouth\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff21

trigger.match: Your head snaps back as your skull is \w+ hard and fractures\, causing your thoughts to spin\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff22

trigger.match: Your (left|right) thigh bone is \w+ and shatters under the force of the blow\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff23
trigger.send: wounds:add ("%1leg") if not affs:has ("mangled_%1leg") then affs:add_queue ("broken_%1leg") end

trigger.match: The bones of your (left|right) wrist breaks? as it is \w+\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff24

trigger.match: Your (left|right) leg is \w+ with an awesome blow and pulverized into a bloody stump\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff25

trigger.match: Your head is \w+ with crushing force\, and your mind becomes so addled that you can only blink blankly about yourself\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff26

trigger.match: You are mortally wounded when \w+ in the gut\. Your internal organs have ruptured and turned to jelly\. If you do not heal soon\, you shall die\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff27

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ deeply into your (left|right) arm\, which hits a nerve and makes that arm twitch involuntarily\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff28

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ into your gut\, which opens up and pours blood in a pool at your feet\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff29

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ off your (left|right) ear\, and blood fills your ear canal\, making you somewhat dizzy\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff30

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ deep into your chest\, and you grit your teeth as the blade twists violently\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff31

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ into your chest and blood foams up from your mouth\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff32

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ deep into your gut\, and a bloody intestine partially erupts with a foul stench\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff33

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ cleanly \w+ off your scalp\, and blinding pain and blood reverberates across your entire head\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff34

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ deep into your (left|right) foot\, pinning it down with .+?\. You involuntarily crumple to a crouch and can think of nothing but freeing your impaled foot\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff35
trigger.send: if wounds ["cwpn"] then affs:add ("pierced_%1leg") wounds:add ("%1leg", 4) affs:pinleg() end

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ powerfully into your chest\, and blood sprays out of your nose and mouth\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff36

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ your neck\, and blood fountains out in a thick spray\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff37

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ plunges (?:[hH]is|[hH]er) blade through your gut\, and you are impaled viciously on the blade\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff38

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ the tendon above your (left|right) heel\, and you scream in agony as it\'s completely severed\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff39

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ powerfully \w+ your (left|right) leg\, and blood fountains out in a thick spray\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff40

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ into your gut and heaves upwards\, rupturing your stomach which causes you to spit up a bloody bile\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff41

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ into your back and you feel your spine shatter with a sickening crunch as all feeling in your limbs fades into horrifying numbness\.$

trigger.name: wound_aff43

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ into your chest and you feel a rib snap like a twig under the force of (?:[hH]is|[hH]er) blow\.$

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ across your forehead and leaves a long furrow that weeps blood onto your face\.$
trigger.name: wound_aff46

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ into your midriff and slices through\, drawing (?:[hH]is|[hH]er) blade out in a spray of crimson blood as your lungs wheeze to breathe\.$

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ your throat\, crushing your windpipe\.$

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ open your gut\, and coils of bloody intestines spill out in a grotesque mass\. You begin to feel lightheaded as the world darkens around you\.$

trigger.match: [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ deep into your (left|right) shoulder\, which collapses a nerve and sends spasms throughout your limp arm\.$

trigger.name: wound_aff53
